ingredients: 2 lb boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-size pieces
label: Indian
nearest_neighbor_ingredients:

  • 2 teaspoons curry powder or garam masala

  • 1 cup red lentils

  • 4 cups water
  • 1 14-ounce can "lite" coconut milk
  • 5 lime wedges

• 1 tbsp oil
  • 1 onion, chopped

  • ¼ tsp coriander powder
  • ¼ tsp turmeric powder

  • Pitta breads or plain basmati rice, to serve

• 12 chicken drumsticks
  • 2 TBS coconut oil, ghee, or butter (where to get good quality fats)

  • 1 tsp cumin powder
  • 1 tsp coriander powder
  • 1 tsp turmeric
  • ½ tsp garam masala (like this)
  • ¼ tsp cinnamon powder
  • ⅛ tsp cardamom powder
  • 4 TBS homemade bone broth (or water)
  • 1 medium tomato, quartered
  • 4 TBS full fat coconut milk (where to buy BPA and additive free coconut milk)

  • 2 inch piece of fresh ginger
  • 1 tsp celtic sea salt
